name: Distant (Gunkster, MarineMonarch)
description:
WADS  or arrow keys to move and jump.  

Press Q when standing at the terminal to switch between Willie and Kat. 

Press E when standing at the terminal to recall boxes to their initial position, Kat only. 

Made for the Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam

Lead Programmer/Writer - Blake Legens

Lead Art/Level Designer - Ella Blake

Game Sound Effects purchased from gostlygurustudios

Game Font is Merriam Libre by Michal Sahar

Open Space by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
